text: Hello everyone! Three years ago, I released the Lie Detector app. It was a prank app, just for fun. But then I thought: What if I tried to create a real lie detector powered by artificial intelligence? And so, I made a lie detector that analyzes voice, captures the face, and studies facial expressions while you speak. I’m not saying it’s 100% accurate—even real polygraphs aren’t that precise. But it can detect lies with high probability. I worked on this app for a long time, spending countless hours training the AI model. I think it turned out pretty cool! Give it a try. 1. Hello everyone!

    Three years ago, I released the Lie Detector app. It was a prank app, just for fun. But then I thought: What if I tried to create a real lie detector powered by artificial intelligence?

    And so, I made a lie detector that analyzes voice, captures the face, and studies facial expressions while you speak. I’m not saying it’s 100% accurate—even real polygraphs aren’t that precise. But it can detect lies with high probability.

    I worked on this app for a long time, spending countless hours training the AI model. I think it turned out pretty cool! Give it a try. And I’d really appreciate it if you left a review on Google Play—it’s the best reward for my hard work!
